text: Timothy Sylvester Harris (born 14 January 1964) was the 3rd Prime Minister of Saint Kitts and Nevis from 2015 to 2022. Harris was Minister of Foreign Affairs from 10 August 2001 to 25 January 2008, Minister for Finance from 2008 to 2010, and Senior Minister for Agriculture from 2010 to 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * St. Kitts & Nevis - Government of St. Kitts and Nevis official website * United Nations - Permanent Mission of St. Kitts and Nevis to the United Nations Statement by His Excellency Dr. Timothy Harris Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Saint Kitts and Nevis Category:Current national leaders Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Timothy Harris
